column2: (let ((base "*vm-blookup-name*")) (let ((b (get-buffer-create base))) (unwind-protect (list (generate-new-buffer-name base) (generate-new-buffer-name base nil) (generate-new-buffer-name base t) (generate-new-buffer-name base :keyword) (generate-new-buffer-name base "*vm-blookup-name*<5>")) (kill-buffer b))))
